game_description: No More Rainbows brings the fun of a classic platformer to VR. Use the intuitive locomotion mechanics to run, jump, and climb using only your hands. As the Beast, rampage through colorful worlds to reclaim your desecrated Underworld. Extend your experience with 3v3 multiplayer game mode to become the world’s most respected beast! - Play as the Beast of the Underworld and destroy happiness in a reversed good vs evil setting. - Precise locomotion using only your hands and arms with tight platformer mechanics. - A complete single player campaign with 4 unique worlds, 28 levels full of mini-games and secrets to uncover. - Discover the lore through environmental storytelling and unforgettable boss encounters against your nemesis. - Play an exciting multiplayer mode with or against friends, show off your skills in 12 different battle arenas. - Personalize your beast with cosmetics and skins, over 1,000,000 possible combinations to choose from. - Become the world's best speed demon through local and worldwide leaderboards for each level. Relive your favorite classic platformer game nostalgia through this VR adventure!
review_1: Honestly at first I thought it was a gorilla tag ripoff judging by its locomotion and I thought it was weird how you are making a rip off game into a real one until I bought it and found it it’s nothing like it and I love it and great fir taking your anger out and has so many surprises in store yet my only complaint is world 3’s boss fight ITS SO ANNOYING AGGGHHH but we’ll graphics and I love it ty for this game! Stop scrolling There is nothing down here This is getting weird now HAVE U LEARNT ANY MANNERS FINE! Take some golden eggs then
review_2: Worth full price Or get it 25 prcnt cheaper (the comma is a dot, and remove the spaces): b i t , l y / n o m o r e r a i n b o w s Love this game. Best use of arm based locomotion anywhere on the Quest! Love a game that was great when released AND gets updates! New go up mode (new version every week!) and multiplayer are both fun, but base campaign alone is well worth the money.
review_3: This is a truly good game I've seen many people rating the game bad because all you do is defeat white blobs but you have to defeat white blobs and but it's a Platformer a very good platformer there Is even climbing with your claws the movement is what makes this different from other platformers you can move with your hand use 2 of your hands at the same time to do a long jump the worlds and levels are greatly designed and are perfect also the worlds are designed like levels so you must do a little bit of parkour to get to the next level and by the time I'm writing this review the TESTING ZONE IS COMING TO NO MORE RAINBOWS so even more Content
review_4: I genuinely love this gam I’ve bin and playing since bata and the full game came out I didn’t really play it because it costed but then I saw the trail so I got and I had a lot of fun If u haven’t bought the game buy it or use the trial if u are thinking nothing else Stop scrolling There’s nothing else There is nothing else u don’t believe me
review_5: The devs are amazing and the graphics are amazing the game is really good and has a really good story mode your campaign multiplayer is fun I normally destroy lobbies there's a free unlockable skins and updates come regularly if you don't have no more rainbows definitely get it
